mapper.select: SELECT b.acct_id, b.sid, u.email, u.mobile, date_format( b.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) AS create_time, b.enable_flag AS wallet_status, b.balance / ${money_rate} AS balance, b.credit_balance /${money_rate} AS credit_balance_fmt, p.package_name, p.package_id FROM tb_bill_acct_balance b LEFT JOIN tb_ucpaas_user u ON u.sid = b.sid LEFT JOIN tb_bill_acct_package_rel pr ON pr.sid = b.sid LEFT JOIN tb_bill_package p ON p.package_id = pr.package_id WHERE b.sid = #{sid}

SELECT p.order_id, date_format( p.pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) AS pay_date, p.charge / ${money_rate} AS charge, p.charge_type FROM tb_srv_payment_order p WHERE account_type = 0 and p.`status` = #{payStatus} AND p.sid = #{sid} ORDER BY p.pay_date DESC ${limit}
SELECT count(0) AS totalCount FROM tb_srv_payment_order p WHERE account_type = 0 and p.`status` =#{payStatus} AND p.sid = #{sid}
mapper.update: update tb_bill_acct_balance t set enable_flag=#{enableFlag} where sid=#{sid} and enable_flag=#{enableFlagOld}
update tb_bill_acct_balance t set credit_balance=#{cv} where sid=#{sid}
